articles.author: Cebelihle Mthethwa
articles.title: AfriForum says SAHRC must deliver on promise to take Malema to Equality Court over hate speech - News24
articles.description: AfriForum says it is keeping a watchful eye over the hate speech case of EFF leader Julius Malema to ensure that he is taken to the Equality Court by the South African Human Rights Commission.
articles.content:
• AfriForum says it expects Malema to be taken to the Equality Court by the SAHRC.
  • The 10 days Malema was given by the SAHRC to retract and apologise for hate speech has expired.
